[DQC.US.0127.9592] The statement 1001002 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets includes the concept us-gaap:AccountsPayableCurrent in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called us-gaap:ScheduleOfFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis. The statement presentation group 1001002 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets includes a presentation concept called us-gaap:AccountsPayableCurrent. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table us-gaap:ScheduleOfFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTable:
us-gaap:AccountsPayableCurrent = 91,622,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table us-gaap:ScheduleOfFiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept AccountsPayableCurrent is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : us-gaap:AccountsPayableCurrent Total period : 2021-04-30 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9592 Rule version: 17.0.0RC6 - http://xbrl.fasb.org/us-gaap/2020/elts/us-gaap-2020-01-31.xsd 273
